pi.title: Full Stack Software Developer
pi.bio:
A lifelong lover of new technologies, Wilson is a self-taught app developer who joined his first company in late 2019 as a Front End Web Developer. Intrigued by end-to-end app development, he progressed to become a Full Stack developer with skills in project management, software architecture, and SEO. With his skills as a front-end developer and hard worker, he was the technical project manager for the development of the PNBooking product for his company in August 2020.

He is very excited about the challenge of joining a new team, working well with this team to achieve their goals.

we.title: Software Engineer Consultant
we.description: As a consultant, I am on assignment at [Quable](https://quable.com/ "Quable"), working on the Quable's PIM as a FrontEnd developer
achievements: Implement new React components and integrate them into pages on a full front-end refactoring process;
Fixing detected bugs.

we.title: Full Stack JavaScript Developer, Head of back-end development

we.title: PHP Developer, Technical project leader
we.description: This 6 month period was dedicated to the development of a new solution for booking hotels and furnished apartments [PNBooking.com ↗](https://pnbooking.com "PNBooking.com ↗")
achievements: Proposal of solution to the technical problems for the realization of the modules of the application;
Development of new Prestashop modules to extend the functionality of the application;
Implementation of an SEO strategy with standard tags, Schema.org vocabulary, twitter cards and Facebook open graph.

we.title: Freelance Full Stack Developer
we.description: Mi'djamo is a medical care provider that helps hospitals extend services to patient doorsteps. ([View on Google Play ↗](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.proxicare "View on Google Play ↗"))

we.title: Freelance Front-End Developer
we.description: Kathalog is a restaurant search and discovery site. This platform reveals the geolocation, photos, addresses and menus of restaurants in Cameroon.
achievements: Development of a dashboard to manage the reading operations, and update the resources of the Kathalog.net application;
Integrate back-end application for all views.

we.title: Front-End Developer

we.title: Software developer (Internship)

education.title: Baccalaureat C In Mathematics and Physics

personal-projects.description: Note PWA is an application build on top of the modern javascript APIs for storing notes browser side.
Creation of truth tables of logical expressions in conjunctive form, its role is to read and parse an expression then generate its truth table.
